description: This creamy, comforting vanilla rice pudding is practically a no-stir wonder with the help of the slow cooker.
keywords: Rice pudding,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,High protein,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Rice,Slow cooker,Peanut free
name: Slow Cooker Vanilla Rice Pudding Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Bring the milk to a simmer in a saucepan and mix in the rice. Grease the slow cooker basin with butter and pour the mix into the slow cooker on high.
Add the vanilla and honey and cook for 2.5 hours until tender and creamy, stirring once halfway through cooking.
